abstract: Creates a layout dimension object from two anchors.
overview:
## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLayoutDimension] object represented by the two anchors.

## Discussion

Use the returned object to define constraints relative to the space between the current anchor and the object in the `otherAnchor` parameter.

# anchorWithOffset(to:)

**Instance Method**

Creates a layout dimension object from two anchors.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func anchorWithOffset(to otherAnchor: NSLayoutXAxisAnchor) -> NSLayoutDimension
```

## Parameters

- **otherAnchor**: The second anchor to use when creating the layout dimension.

## Return Value

The [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/NSLayoutDimension] object represented by the two anchors.

## Discussion

Use the returned object to define constraints relative to the space between the current anchor and the object in the `otherAnchor` parameter.
